publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: And it's time to take what we have gathered
And it's time to save what we have left
Do not cry for both of us are happy
Do not try to make us change our minds
Do not cry there shouldn't be no sadness
Do not cry for this is not an end
There were times of tears and awful sadness
There were times when we could not take more
There were times things seemed to get better
There were times when things could not get worse
now's the time to step out of our doorstep
now's the time to open brand new doors
